analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/47/0x1c0987e79a6328374119ed34df64881b3a40f5a7.sol:
	Contract UPCHAINS has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/47/0x1c0987e79a6328374119ed34df64881b3a40f5a7.sol#196-197)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/47/0x1c0987e79a6328374119ed34df64881b3a40f5a7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/47/0x1c0987e79a6328374119ed34df64881b3a40f5a7.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/47/0x1c0987e79a6328374119ed34df64881b3a40f5a7.sol#44) is not in mixedCase
